overview: Bravo Chef: Italian Cuisine (2009)  September 29th, 2009. Belmundo Entertainment. 84 Minutes.  See the top chefs right at work! Working side-by-side with a top chef is a shortcut to mastering special tricks and techniques.  A straightforward and hands-on approach renders lengthy and boring explanations unnecessary.  A modern approach to the most sacred national dishes lets you master them without fear.  The chefs don't hesitate to show you their treasured techniques, they understand that sharing a secret with a kindred spirit is a joy!  Recipes included:  1 - Tuscan Cantucci Biscuits.  2 - Gnocchi with Wild Mushrooms and Shellfish.  3 - Lasagna with Bolognese Sauce.  4 - Ravioli with Creamy Parmesan Filling and Beef Tartare.  5 - Seafood Risotto.  6 - Spaghetti Aglio, Olio, Peperoncino with Tuna Tartare.  7 - Tiramisu with Amaretti Biscuits.  8 - Tuna in Breadcrumbs with a Mixed Leaf Salad.  9 - Vitello Tonnato.
tagline: Learn the Famous Italian Dishes from Italian Chefs.
title: Bravo Chef: Italian Cuisine
